attributes.action: Ban the issuing of licences to shoot seals, to northumbria fishermen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having read the item on the bbc website i was disgusted that fishermen are allowed to shoot seals at random, because they are apparently stealing thousands of pounds worth of fish from their nets.
A: They are NOT stealing, they are surviving, because..
B: The sea is being continually overfished.
These friendly, intelligent animals have taken to the risky strategy of entering a fishing net in order to feed.
And now the fishermen, who i would guess are not marine biologists, are free to randomly shoot females, youngsters etc... I would have to assume that many are only 'winged' and manage to swim off to die elsewhere at a later date.
Quite frankly, its barbaric, has no basis in science and i find it disgusting.
